Test Name: Lysozyme, Immunoglobulin E (IgE), and Serum ELISA
Purpose: To quantitatively measure concentrations of lysozyme, IgE, and serum proteins using ELISA, ensuring accurate and reproducible diagnostic results.
Container: Serum or plasma collection tube (not specified in SOP)
Equipment: ELISA kits, ELISA microplates, micropipettes/multichannel pipettes, and a compatible plate reader
